select.id_ceh: SELECT id FROM struct_ceh WHERE caption = ? AND org_id = ?
select.id_uch: SELECT id FROM struct_uch WHERE caption = ? AND par_id = ? AND ceh_id = ?
select.id_rm: SELECT id FROM struct_rm WHERE ceh_id = ? AND uch_id = ? AND caption = ? ORDER BY id
select.id_analog: SELECT id FROM anal_group WHERE rm_id = ? AND main = ?

insert.add_ceh: INSERT INTO struct_ceh(org_id, caption, deleted, m_order, mguid) VALUES(?, ?, 0, ?, ?)
insert.add_uch: INSERT INTO struct_uch(par_id, ceh_id, node_level, caption, deleted, m_order, mguid) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, 0, ?, ?)
insert.add_rm: INSERT INTO struct_rm (caption, ceh_id, uch_id, codeok, etks, m_order, mguid, kut1, file_sout) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 2, ?)
insert.add_analog: INSERT INTO anal_group (group_id, rm_id, main) VALUES(?, ?, ?)

update.update_analog: UPDATE anal_group SET group_id = ? WHERE id = ?
